name: react-hot-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for ReactJS project with hot code reloading

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && babel src/otp.js --out-file build/index.js  --source-maps inline
scripts.build:tests: mkdir -p build/ && babel src/otp.spec.js --out-file build/spec.js  --source-maps inline
scripts.build:tests:utils: mkdir -p build/ && babel src/test-utils.js --out-file build/test-utils.js  --source-maps inline
scripts.docs:md: mkdir -p docs && documentation build ./src/index.js --format md --github -o docs/API.md
scripts.docs:md:watch: mkdir -p docs && documentation build -w ./src/index.js --format md --github -o docs/API.md
